title: A Capricious Cat And A Shy Lion
alternative_title: Kimagure Neko to Kiyowa na Lion
status: Kimagure Neko to Kiyowa na Lion
description:
Description :
        Yasukazu is a scary-faced businessman who adores cats. One day? while in the middle of brooding over how bad he is with the female customers in cat cafes? he happens to discover one with a majority of male customers. While he unwinds with cute cats he starts falling in love with the devilishly se** Jun who works there! Can love prevail between the scary-looking cat lover and the quirky cafe manager...? Immerse yourself in this steamy yaoi comedy and let the kitties and men wash the stress away!
